description:
Register: https://cppcon.org/registration/ 
Join Barry Revzin and Kevin Carpenter from September 13th - 21st at CppCon 2025 Aurora, Colorado
---

Learn Why Experts Are Excited About C++ Reflection At Barry Revzin's CppCon 2025 Talk!

CppCon 2025 is just around the corner, and Kevin Carpenter from @cppevents interviews Barry Revzin who is giving a talk on C++ reflection called "Practical Reflection"! Reflection is a hot topic as it is a new feature in C++26 and as a member of the standards committee, Barry's talk will outline the broader implications of c++ reflection for metaprogramming and library development, and the transformative role it could play in the future of C++

Session Description
With the adoption of Reflection for C++26, the landscape of what is possible has shifted. This talk will focus on implementing Struct-of-Arrays for an arbitrary aggregate, but will also take some detours to cover some techniques that will prove useful for solving a wide range of problems. 
---

title: Learn Why Experts Are Excited About C++ Reflection At Barry Revzin's CppCon 2025 Talk!
